Notes: There's been reports of agreements the Argentina government has made with Pfizer, the University of Oxford, and the Sputnik vaccine. He has stated that 600,000 vaccines will be coming before the end of the December and that he will be the first to be vaccinated to ensure public trust; however, there have been no specifics released about who gets priority or if the vaccines will be government funded.     https://web.archive.org/web/20201214191635/https://www.batimes.com.ar/news/argentina/government-inks-deal-for-10-million-doses-of-russias-covid-19-vaccine.phtml

There's been reports of agreements the Argentina government has made with Pfizer, the University of Oxford, and the Sputnik vaccine. He has stated that 600,000 vaccines will be coming before the end of the December and that he will be the first to be vaccinated to ensure public trust; however, there have been no specifics released about who gets priority or if the vaccines will be government funded.     https://web.archive.org/web/20201214191635/https://www.batimes.com.ar/news/argentina/government-inks-deal-for-10-million-doses-of-russias-covid-19-vaccine.phtml

A:    Argentines will be vaccinated with the Russian Sputnik V coronavirus vaccine beginning on Tuesday 29 December.    "The doses of the Sputnik V vaccine that arrived from Russia will be available in each province and on Tuesday Dec. 29 at 9 am the simultaneous vaccination will begin throughout the country," President Alberto Fernandez said Sunday in a tweet.    Argentine medical workers began receiving the vaccine and officials insisted it was safe. President Alberto Fernández called it the largest vaccination campaign in the country’s modern history.    The vaccine  will be free and voluntary.      https://web.archive.org/web/20210104125537/https://www.aa.com.tr/en/americas/argentina-covid-19-vaccinations-with-sputnik-v-start/2090879    https://web.archive.org/web/20210104125657/https://apnews.com/article/belarus-coronavirus-pandemic-latin-america-auto-racing-glance-russia-fcddcc286f8295421c0ff301c242dad0

A:    "The Ministry of Health of the Nation reports that as of today the jurisdictions reported the application of 107,542 of the 300,000 doses distributed of the Sputnik V vaccine. In this first stage, the vaccine is intended for health personnel between 18 and 59 years of age, from intensive care units and microbiology laboratories of health institutions located in large urban agglomerates where the pandemic has had a greater impact."    "It should be noted that the vaccines are provided by the National State and the vaccination plan is carried out in stages, free of charge, voluntarily and regardless of the history of having suffered from coronavirus."    https://web.archive.org/web/20210111182006/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/ya-se-aplicaron-107542-dosis-de-la-vacuna-contra-covid-19-en-el-pais

"The Ministry of Health of the Nation reports that as of today the jurisdictions reported the application of 107,542 of the 300,000 doses distributed of the Sputnik V vaccine. In this first stage, the vaccine is intended for health personnel between 18 and 59 years of age, from intensive care units and microbiology laboratories of health institutions located in large urban agglomerates where the pandemic has had a greater impact."    "It should be noted that the vaccines are provided by the National State and the vaccination plan is carried out in stages, free of charge, voluntarily and regardless of the history of having suffered from coronavirus."    "Tomorrow (January 16, 2021) the 300,000 doses will arrive with the second component so that health personnel can complete the two-dose scheme," added the official who commented that the distribution operation throughout the country will be similar to the first time based on the joint with all jurisdictions."    https://web.archive.org/web/20210111182006/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/ya-se-aplicaron-107542-dosis-de-la-vacuna-contra-covid-19-en-el-pais  https://web.archive.org/web/20210115190146/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/ya-se-aplicaron-200759-dosis-de-la-vacuna-contra-la-covid-19-en-argentina

AC:  "The Ministry of Health of the Nation reports that as of today the jurisdictions reported the application of 107,542 of the 300,000 doses distributed of the Sputnik V vaccine. In this first stage, the vaccine is intended for health personnel between 18 and 59 years of age, from intensive care units and microbiology laboratories of health institutions located in large urban agglomerates where the pandemic has had a greater impact."    "It should be noted that the vaccines are provided by the National State and the vaccination plan is carried out in stages, free of charge, voluntarily and regardless of the history of having suffered from coronavirus."    "Tomorrow (January 16, 2021) the 300,000 doses will arrive with the second component so that health personnel can complete the two-dose scheme," added the official who commented that the distribution operation throughout the country will be similar to the first time based on the joint with all jurisdictions."    "Said González García. And he added: 'This first stage we do the vaccination to protect those who have to take care of us, which are health workers, starting with the most exposed; but on Monday (February 22, 2021) they start with those over 70 years old and then we will reach everyone the entrerrianos, working together. '"    "The Minister of Health, Carla Vizzotti, and the Minister of Education, Nicolás Trotta, held a virtual meeting this afternoon in which they evaluated the implementation of the vaccination of teachers and non-teaching education workers throughout the country from the arrival of a million doses of Sinopharm vaccines.    Vizzotti, who is isolated due to having been diagnosed with COVID-19, highlighted that “23 of the 24 jurisdictions are already planning between today (March 3, 2021) and tomorrow (March 4, 2021) the start of the vaccination of teachers according to their strategic plan, joining the rest of the groups that continue to be inoculated, and it is great news ”."    https://web.archive.org/web/20210111182006/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/ya-se-aplicaron-107542-dosis-de-la-vacuna-contra-covid-19-en-el-pais  https://web.archive.org/web/20210115190146/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/ya-se-aplicaron-200759-dosis-de-la-vacuna-contra-la-covid-19-en-argentina  https://web.archive.org/web/20210218223803/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/gonzalez-garcia-superviso-el-plan-de-vacunacion-contra-la-covid-19-en-entre-rios  https://web.archive.org/web/20210308163559/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/los-ministerios-de-salud-y-de-educacion-analizaron-el-inicio-de-la-campana-de-vacunacion-de

AstraZeneca / Sinopharm / Sputnik V     https://web.archive.org/web/20210531162310/https://www.telam.com.ar/notas/202105/555915-argentina-vacunas-coronavirus-recibidas-detalle-cifras.html

"Currently, and given the shortage of vaccines, it has been arranged at the national level to prioritize that a greater proportion of the population have at least one dose of vaccine over the complete scheme of a reduced group. In this way, it is intended to provide protection to high-risk groups against the worsening of the pandemic. Therefore, the interval between doses has been extended to 3 months."  Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20210613191200/https://www.infobae.com/tendencias/2021/06/10/segunda-dosis-que-sucede-si-no-me-llaman-para-la-siguiente-aplicacion/    More info (official): https://web.archive.org/web/20210613190923/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/una-de-cada-dos-personas-entre-55-y-59-anos-ya-recibio-la-primera-dosis-de-vacuna-contra-la

The public monitor shows that more than 1 million doses were applied to people without risk factors and who do not belong to key groups, which allows to conclude that the availability was expanded.    https://web.archive.org/web/20210621123720/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/coronavirus/vacuna/aplicadas     Administering Sputnik V, Sinopharm and Astrazeneca  https://web.archive.org/web/20210621124453/https://www.telam.com.ar/notas/202106/558453-argentina-vacunas-coronavirus-astrazeneca-estados-unidos-sinopharm-aerolineas-china.html

Six million people are waiting for the second dose of Sputnik and the Government still does not know when they will arrive.    https://web.archive.org/web/20210627130935/https://www.infobae.com/politica/2021/06/23/seis-millones-de-personas-esperan-la-segunda-dosis-de-sputnik-y-el-gobierno-aun-no-sabe-cuando-llegaran/

"In 18 of the 24 jurisdictions, people under 40 are already vaccinated without risky conditions"  https://web.archive.org/web/20210705134910/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/noticias/argentina-supero-el-50-de-vacunados-mayores-de-18-anos-y-ayer-se-cumplio-un-nuevo-record    However, more than 800,000 people have expired for the application of the second dose of Sputnik V, which did not arrive according to the scheduled dates.  https://web.archive.org/web/20210705135118/https://www.infobae.com/politica/2021/07/04/mas-de-800000-personas-tienen-el-plazo-vencido-para-la-aplicacion-de-la-segunda-dosis-de-la-sputnik-v/

The difficulty in accessing the second dose of Sputnik V continues, so that some people are not fully vaccinated.    "Given the limitation that exists with the second component of the Sputnik V vaccine, we have launched the combination study to have other alternatives," said the Buenos Aires Minister of Health, Fernán Quirós.  https://web.archive.org/web/20210712144033/https://www.clarin.com/ciudades/sputnik-v-escasez-componente-2-cuantas-vacunas-faltan-haran-conseguirlas_0_Lz_4qGbhA.html    Administering Sputnik V, Covishield, Sinopharm, AstraZeneca  https://web.archive.org/web/20210712143323/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/coronavirus/vacuna/cuales

"Argentina is still very behind in the application of second doses against the coronavirus in relation to the rest of the region. 35% of the total population has yet to complete their inoculation scheme"  https://web.archive.org/web/20210719141024/https://www.infobae.com/politica/2021/07/14/segunda-dosis-con-solo-el-11-de-la-poblacion-vacunada-argentina-se-ubica-en-el-puesto-12-entre-19-paises-de-la-region/    Administering Sputnik V, Covishield, Sinopharm, AstraZeneca  https://web.archive.org/web/20210719140538/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/coronavirus/vacuna/cuales

The first consignment of the vaccine will arrive in the country very soon.  The plan is to vaccinate all the people together, so we will roll out the nationwide vaccination program only when we have sufficient doses for all the targetted population.  Once we have the required number of doses, our plan is to vaccinate the entire population in their respective communities, gewogs and chiwogs in one week. We are well on track with health facilities and human resource planning. India has already supplied around 5.5 lakh vaccine doses to Bhutan in two batches. And, roughly 80% of adults in the Himalayan country have been vaccinated with the first dose. Bhutan had said that it would fully vaccinate the entire country by the end of June. However, vaccine crunch in India might delay Bhutan's plan for 100% immunization. Earlier this month, Bhutanese Foreign Minister Tandi Dorji said the Indian government had assured Bhutan that it would provide the half-million AstraZeneca vaccines, known as Covishield in India, required for the second dose to achieve full immunization.  http://web.archive.org/web/20210531151256if_/https://www.livemint.com/news/india/india-requires-more-covid-vaccines-will-not-exert-pressure-for-supply-bhutan-11621693513156.html    http://web.archive.org/web/20210531151256if_/https://www.livemint.com/news/india/india-requires-more-covid-vaccines-will-not-exert-pressure-for-supply-bhutan-11621693513156.html

On the 14th of October, 2020, there was a statement by MSP stating that it has already started actions to prepare the country for the application of the vaccine against COVID-19, of which the Government has committed a sufficient amount as soon as it is available .    The Vice Minister of Collective Health, Dr. Ivelisse Acosta explained that an international consultancy has been hired to design the logistics for the application of the vaccine and determine the equipment and training needs of the health service personnel who will work in this program.    He said that these tasks began last Friday and that first of all all people who work in the health service, the elderly and people with comorbidity (diabetes, high blood pressure and others) will be vaccinated.    Please see: https://web.archive.org/web/20201221231059/https://coronavirusrd.gob.do/2020/10/14/msp-inicio-acciones-para-preparar-el-pais-para-aplicacion-de-la-vacuna-contra-el-covid-19/

GIS – 22 March 2021: Mauritius continues its national vaccination campaign with the COVAXIN vaccine, developed by Bharat Biotech in collaboration with the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR), and today, 6 942 persons were successfully inoculated with it.  Dr Joomaye recalled that the Indian High-Commissioner, Mrs Nandini Singla, as well as the First Lady, Mrs Kobita Jugnauth, were among the first persons today to receive the COVAXIN vaccine at the Pandit Sahadeo Gymnasium in Vacoas. He pointed out that several athletes, artists and influencers were also vaccinated in other centres, and reminded that Government is doing its best to receive more vaccine doses so as to reach herd immunity at the earliest.  https://archive.vn/DBMMo

A Cabinet Meeting Press Release stated that Uganda has approved the procurement of 18,000,000 doses of the Astra Zeneca Vaccine from the Serum Institute of India. It stated "the order placed will only be confirmed upon the remission of $5,000,000 USD as down payment out of ...". Additionally, the statement noted that Uganda is expected to receive 3,552,000 doses of the AstraZeneca vaccine through the COVAX facility managed by GAVI. These are expected to arrive in late February or Early March.    https://web.archive.org/web/20210208194103/https://twitter.com/GovUganda/status/1356542483023466498  https://web.archive.org/web/20210208215312/https://twitter.com/Kemba_A/status/1356683703448182787  https://web.archive.org/web/20210208215615/https://healthpolicy-watch.news/uganda-defends-astrazeneca-price-says-its-not-higher-than-other-countries/

Vaccine supplies remain limited. Healthcare workers, those over 50, teachers, and those with underlying conditions continue to be prioritized. Vaccines available: AstraZeneca    Uganda is part of the global COVAX initiative and has received a first round of Astra-Zeneca vaccine  as well as two donated allotments of Astra-Zeneca vaccine. Additional vaccine through further donations, the second round of Astra-Zeneca, and procurement by Uganda government are expected in mid- to late-July. Private health entities have plans to purchase vaccines that will be offered to paying clients as part of the overall national vaccine plans. Precise dates or locations where vaccines for purchase would be available have not yet been publicized.    Link: https://web.archive.org/web/20210719151700/https://ug.usembassy.gov/covid-19-information-page/
